author: Anil T
title: Lovely hotel however customer service could have been better.
text:
The Roosevelt was a brilliant place to stay and is in a fantastic location for going anywhere in New York. The only downsides were the size of the room and the customer service we received.
The rooms are small so be prepared. We were meant to be upgraded automatically however this never happened so we ended up in a cosy room instead of the superior which wasn't awful as the bed was lovely and comfortable but again a little small.
The customer service we received was sporadic. It was good sometimes and cold other times. Some of the staff were lovely and pleasant and helpful however a lot of them were cold and simply seemed that they just wanted to get rid of you.
Overall I would recommend this hotel and I would return given the beauty, location and price. I do look forward to returning however I would use it more as a staging area to move about the city rather than use its facilities. (Room service was excellent though).
